Title: Death of the Yakuza
Plot:
No criminal group in the world is more closely identified with tattoos than the largest - Japan's Yakuza, 80,000 strong.

In this episode of Marked, we go deep into Japan's underground for an exclusive look at the stunning full bodysuits of ink that mark the skin of today's Yakuza. Hidden within the layers of spectacular imagery are secret codes that reach far back into Japan's bloody samurai history: violent warriors, images of hell, prostitutes, and a range of predators from tigers to dragons.
